actions.description: the virtual assistant gestures towards the shop button with an inviting smile
actions.name: invite_to_shop

actions.description: the virtual assistant points to the cart icon with excitement, indicating it's ready to help
actions.name: point_to_cart

actions.description: the virtual assistant makes a sweeping motion towards the shopping section with a welcoming demeanor
actions.name: sweep_towards_shopping

actions.description: the virtual assistant enthusiastically displays the 'Our items' section with an animated flourish
actions.name: flourish_items

actions.description: the virtual assistant nods and smiles while introducing the Adidas item to the user
actions.name: introduce_item

actions.description: the virtual assistant showcases the 'Winter body' item with a gentle wave, drawing attention to its features
actions.name: showcase_winter_body

actions.description: the virtual assistant encourages the user to explore more options with a friendly nod and gestures to the options area
actions.name: explore_more_options

actions.description: the virtual assistant raises an eyebrow and gestures as if to suggest creating a new item with a positive attitude
actions.name: create_new_item

description: This webpage features a shopping experience focused on footwear. It includes sections for featured items such as 'Adidas', 'Vans', and 'White', along with buttons for shopping, viewing the cart, and adding items to the cart. The layout invites users to browse and interact with product offerings.
